confirmYesno

public static void confirmYesno(Context context,
                                CharSequence msg,
                                DialogInterface.OnClickListener onYes,
                                DialogInterface.OnCancelListener onNo)
Shows a confirmation dialog.

Parameters:
context - Context
msg - the message.
onYes - will be called if the user selects positive answer (a Yes or OK).
onNo - will be called after the user cancelled the dialog.
